Package org.antlr.intellij.adaptor.lexer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AntlrLexerAdapter<State extends AntlrLexerState>
    This is the base class for implementations of Lexer backed by an ANTLR 4 lexer.
    AntlrLexerState
    This class stores the state of an ANTLR lexer, such that it can be applied back to the lexer instance at a later time.
    ElementTypeFactory  
    PsiTokenSource  
    RuleElementType
    Represents a specific ANTLR rule in the language of the plug-in and is the intellij "token type" of an interior PSI tree node.
    SimpleAntlrAdapter
    This default implementation of AntlrLexerAdapter supports any ANTLR 4 lexer that does not store extra information for use in custom actions.
    TokenElementType
    Represents a token in the language of the plug-in.
